name: Housing Assistance
description: HPP’s Housing Assistance Program serves hundreds of families annually with housing case management; limited, short-term financial assistance; and workshops that help families obtain and retain safe housing. In addition to housing counseling, strategy and search, HPP helps families apply for rental assistance from the San Francisco Emergency Rental Assistance Program (SFERAP). Eligibility for housing services and resources vary. Programs that assist with housing: - Financial Assistance - Housing
